actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to establish an effective real annual rate of interest at 4.7 percent for special obligations issued to the Social Security trust funds.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Preserving Social Security Act of 2005 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act with regard to the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund to revise requirements for the issuance of obligations for purchase by the Funds. Establishes an effective annual rate of interest at 4.7 percent for such obligations.

titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to establish an effective real annual rate of interest at 4.7 percent for special obligations issued to the Social Security trust funds.
